title: Who was Olaudah Equiano and why is he important? - Quora

response.answer_text: Olaudah Equiano was a slave brought to America in the 1750s by the Middle Passage.  Though illiterate at the time, he later learned to read and write and documented the horrors of the slave trade in his 1789 autobiography. His work shed light onto just how abysmal slaves' living conditions were during the Middle Passage and once they were bought.
